EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - Sydney
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in Sydney.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Friday, July 1st, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/sydney]]>
Location Pivotal Sydney <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/sydney]]> Level 11 155 Clarence Street Sydney NSW 2000 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/155+Clarence+St,+Sydney+NSW+2000,+Australia/@-33.8696815,151.2009962,16z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x6b12ae3f243f9a9b:0xe6f5bcb648235860!8m2!3d-33.869686!4d151.2053736]]>
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
